name: SUMS
storyline:
Welcome to "S.U.M.S.", the epic video game from DragonMouse Studio. Immerse yourself in a world full of adventure and possibilities. You are the hero in the ancient legend of Shadowed Island who can save the island from a terrible fate. Your mission is to defeat the angel of death and break the curse that weighs on the island.

But this is only the beginning of your adventure. On Shadow Island there are countless ways to keep you busy and enjoy your life. You can fight enemies, build your own house, go to work and become rich. But fishing, farming and discovering new friendships on the island are also possibilities for you.

Imagine wandering through the magnificent forests, running along the river and fighting your way through the majestic mountains to defeat the Angel of Death. You'll have to improve your skills and equipment to win the battle and break the curse.

But even if you decide to live a life on the island, there are endless possibilities to spend your free time. Build your own house, decorate it and improve it to make it a true home. Take on different jobs to earn money and improve your equipment and skills. Or simply expand your knowledge in the art of fishing or farming.

The game offers a huge open world to explore, full of secrets and treasures. Discover new places and challenges, and find friends and allies on your journey.

This is no ordinary video game. It's an epic adventure full of possibilities and choices you'll have to make to determine your destiny. Are you ready to take on the challenges of Shadow Island? What are you waiting for? Dive into the world of "S.U.M.S." now and experience an adventure you'll never forget.
summary: Super unaccurate Midage Simulator (S.U.M.S.) is an open world sandbox game in which you can completely individualize yourself thanks to the complex RPG mechanics. Meet quirky characters, do jobs and build your own village.
